dialogue.speaker: Lila, the brave adventurer
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria! I've been searching for the legendary sword of light for years.

dialogue.speaker: Zorvath, the wise wizard
dialogue.text: Ah, Lila! I see you're still on that quest. Be warned, the journey will be treacherous. The dark forces of Malakar are stirring.

dialogue.speaker: Lila, the brave adventurer
dialogue.text: I'm not afraid of Malakar's minions! With your help, Zorvath, I'll overcome any obstacle. What's the first step on our journey?
